name: Simetery
description:
Welcome to Simetery ! Background

In Simetery, you manage a cemetery and its... Inhabitants.

Your goal is to harvest the lives of the city folks to expand your cemetery even more.

To do so, you need to cause accidents by clicking of the different people/car to kill them.

Then, build a gravedigger's house to harvest the fallen soul to a tombstone.

You can then start to automate everything by building : 
- a destroyer's house to automatically cause accidents
- a harvester's altar to automatically harvest tombstones
- a repairer's toolbox to repair broken tombstones

Controls

Use WASD or screen edges to move the camera.
Use 1, 2, 3 to switch between "select", "build" and "destroy" mode (or click their associated buttons).
In "Select" mode, use mouse wheel to cycle through the different buildings.
Click on potential accidents to kill the person.
Click on "filled" tombstones to harvest the soul and gain money.
